nodes.text: An attack was carried out on the Mid Rim world of Namzor by Imperial forces led by Governor Ahr and Darth Vader during the reign of the Galactic Empire. The aim was to secure coaxium supplies and to destroy the insurgents that were near the area. Ahr sent out V-wing starfighters to annihilate them resulting in most of the insurgents dying. As Ahr saw the coaxium supplies, he recalled all of his fighters though Vader in his starship attacked, causing the destruction of the coaxium that Ahr wanted.
